mapper.select: SELECT S.schedule_id, TO_CHAR(S.schedule_date, 'YYYY"년 "MM"월 "DD"일"') as schedule_date, TO_CHAR(S.schedule_date, 'HH24"시 "MI"분"') as schedule_time, S.schedule_title, S.location FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM as scdNum, schedule_id, schedule_title, schedule_date, location FROM SCHEDULE_TBL WHERE group_id = #{group_id} AND schedule_date >= sysdate order by schedule_date ) S WHERE scdNum <= 4

SELECT schedule_id, schedule_title, schedule_content, location, TO_CHAR(schedule_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI') as schedule_date_time, TO_CHAR(schedule_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as schedule_date, TO_CHAR(schedule_date, 'AM HH:MI') as schedule_time, user_id FROM SCHEDULE_TBL WHERE group_id=#{group_id} AND TO_CHAR(schedule_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD')=#{selScheDate}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SCHEDULE_TBL(schedule_id, schedule_date, group_id, user_id, schedule_title, schedule_content, location, attendee_no) VALUES (#{schedule_id}, #{schedule_date}, #{group_id}, #{user_id}, #{schedule_title}, #{schedule_content}, #{location}, 0)
INSERT INTO ATTEND_TBL(attend_id, schedule_id, user_id) VALUES (#{attend_id}, #{schedule_id}, #{user_id})
mapper.update: UPDATE SCHEDULE_TBL SET attendee_no=attendee_no+1 WHERE schedule_id=#{schedule_id}
